languages.text: [Указать на взорвавшийся механизм] "Как ты только что прикончил кучу людей и взорвал священную машину, не коснувшись ее и пальцем?"
[Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"
languages.original_text: [Указать на взорвавшийся механизм] "Как ты только что прикончил кучу людей и взорвал священную машину, не коснувшись ее и пальцем?"

traits.locale_text: [Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"
"Before I allow you into my party, I want to know how you were able to kill all these people and blow up an entire shuttle without laying a finger on it."
"Before I allow you into my party, I wish to know how you were able to kill all these people and demolish a sacred machine without laying a finger on it."
"Before I allow you into my party, I wish to know how you were able to kill all these people and demolish a sacred machine without laying a finger on it."
[Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"
[Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"

languages.text: [指着被炸毁的机器]问："你是怎么做到连一根手指头都没动，就杀了这么多人，还炸毁了一台神圣的机器？"
languages.original_text: [Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"

traits.locale_text: “在允许你加入我的队伍之前，我想先了解一下。你是怎么在完全不动手的情况下杀掉了这么多人，还摧毁了一台神圣的机器？”

languages.text: [Señala la máquina explosionada] "¿Cómo te las has arreglado para matar a un montón de gente y volar una máquina sagrada sin ponerle un dedo encima?".
languages.original_text: [Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"

traits.locale_text: «Antes de que le deje unirse a mi equipo, me gustaría saber cómo ha conseguido matar a toda esa gente y demoler una máquina sagrada sin siquiera tocarla».

languages.text: [爆発したマシンを指差して]「どうやってこれだけの人数を殺し、神聖な機械に指一本触れることなく壊せたんだ？」
languages.original_text: [Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"

traits.locale_text: [爆発したマシンを指差して]「どうやってここまで大勢を殺し、神聖な機械を指一本触れることなく壊せたんだ？」

languages.text: [Désigner la machine détruite] « Comment avez-vous réussi à tuer tous ces gens et à démolir une machine sacrée sans même la toucher ? »
languages.original_text: [Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"

traits.locale_text: « Avant de vous autoriser à rejoindre mon groupe, j'aimerais savoir comment vous avez pu tuer tous ces gens et démolir une machine sacrée sans même la toucher. »

languages.text: [Auf die explodierte Maschine zeigen] "Wie konntet Ihr so viele töten und eine heilige Maschine in die Luft jagen, ohne sie überhaupt zu berühren?"
languages.original_text: [Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"

traits.locale_text: "Bevor ich Euch in meine Gruppe aufnehme, möchte ich wissen, wie Ihr all diese Leute töten und eine heilige Maschine töten konntet, ohne sie auch nur zu berühren."

languages.text: [Patlayan makineyi göster] "Parmağını bile kıpırdatmadan bir sürü insanı öldürmeyi ve kutsal bir makineyi patlatmayı nasıl becerdin?"
languages.original_text: [Point at the exploded machine] "How did you manage to kill off a slew of people and blow up a sacred machine without even laying a finger on it?"

traits.locale_text: [Patlayan makineyi göster] "Parmağını bile kıpırdatmadan bir sürü insanı öldürmeyi ve kutsal bir makineyi patlatmayı nasıl becerdin?"
